alert.note: Alert for Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Talbot County through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tilghman Island, or 8 miles northeast of Breezy Point, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Talbot, St. Michaels, Oxford, Copperville and Tilghman Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
